info.name: VocaCare API
info.description: API collection for VocaCare - AI-Powered Patient Registration System

request.description: Check if the API server is running
Send a test webhook with complete patient data
Get the latest webhook data (frontend polls this endpoint)
Check if webhook data is available
Get all patient records from MongoDB (requires main_with_mongodb.py)
Get specific patient by conversation ID (requires main_with_mongodb.py)
Check if production server is running
